subsections.title: Purpose of Acquisition Strategy
subsections.content: The overall objective of an Acquisition Strategy is to document and inform project stakeholders about how the acquisitions will be planned, executed, and managed throughout the life of the project. The intended audience of the <Project Name> Acquisition Strategy is the project manager, project team, project sponsor, procurement officer/office, and any senior leaders whose support is needed to carry out acquisition plans.
